function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Utilize technology to monitor user position and clothing insulation, and adjust diffuser angle accordingly, also regulate ambient air temperature.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use technology to adjust air flow rates dynamically based on user feedback and environmental conditions, and design nozzles to minimize draught effects.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct thorough performance testing and optimization of the ventilation system design.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of new and efficient technologies for disinfection of air in indoor spaces","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multidisciplinary research involving epidemiologists, hygienists, engineers, and experts in other fields","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establish clear and transparent communication channels for information dissemination","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facilitate bipartisan collaboration and consensus-building on public health policies","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Invest in technological infrastructure for data sharing and decision-making, improve interoperability of public health systems","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive research and analysis to determine the most effective decision-making process for different scenarios","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote adoption of emerging technologies for disaster management, invest in technology infrastructure, and
